name: Nalfeshnee
damage_resistances: bludgeoning,piercing,and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks,Demonic Resilience

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The nalfeshnee makes one Bite attack, one Gore attack, and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 28 (4d8+5) piercing damage. If this attack hits a frightened creature, the nalfeshnee regains HP equal to half the damage dealt.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 19 (4d6+5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 21 (3d10+5) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 16 STR save or be knocked prone.

special_abilities.name: Demonic Resilience
special_abilities.desc: The nalfeshnee is resistant to cold, fire, and lightning damage. In addition, it is immune to poison damage and to the poisoned condition.

special_abilities.name: Horrific Nimbus
special_abilities.desc: The nalfeshnee magically emits scintillating, multicolored light that disorients and frightens mortals. Each creature that isn't an Aberration, Celestial, or Fiend and that starts its turn within 15 feet of the nalfeshnee must succeed on a DC 16 WIS save or be frightened until the start of its next turn. A creature that fails the save by 5 or more must take the Dash action on its turn and move away from the nalfeshnee by the safest available route, unless there is nowhere to move.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The nalfeshnee has advantage on saves against spells and other magical effects.
